MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G74 postcode area of Glasgow affecting properties in Carlyle Drive and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 12:54pm. Our engineers suspect there is an underground cable fault and we require specialist teams to assist with investigations and repair work due to the complexity of the fault. Our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3:43pm on 17th November 2020.
